channel.title: -Shadow Pk-
channel.description:
[center] [size=20pt]ALL SUBJECT TO CHANGE ON LOCATIONS OF STUFF!!![/size] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2zfkc5j.png[/img] Well...What can i say? Shadow Pk has just been started about a week ago, Haven't got anything done besides clearing some places of objects, brain storming for ideas, and adding a few cool things. Anyway, This is my first server ever so be kind lol. Anyway, Shadow Pk is not going to be some server you type ::pure and then go theive for like 5 minutes and then pk. Each player on Shadow pking will have to spend time leveling and making cash.(It's still a lot faster then real RS). Also, A LOT!!! of servers are having problem with dupers, I know a lot of players also hate dupers. I have coded myself , my own ANTI duping. THIS IS NOT A LEECH OF SOMONE ELSE(ALL 100% BY ME).Anyway lets get started!
HOME(I know there is a lot of servers with home as edgeville but I don't care, This is not one of them servers you see everywhere! [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2usa6iq.png[/img] KQ [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2navcqe.png[/img] Quite a bit of work is down here, I coded my own bank stash, as you can see, and made a food shop. So if you get low on hp, bank, buy, eat, kick some butt!
################
TO-DO LIST: DONE In Progress NOT STARTED =============== Home KQ Shops Training Skilling Area CUSTOM GS MINIGAME!! CASTLE WARS(MAYBE) PEST CONTROL Barrows!! [/center]

item.description:
@Christopher_L wrote:

[center]
[size=20pt]ALL SUBJECT TO CHANGE ON LOCATIONS OF STUFF!!![/size]

Well…What can i say? Shadow Pk has just been started about a week ago, Haven’t got anything done besides clearing some places of objects, brain storming for ideas, and adding a few cool things. Anyway, This is my first server ever so be kind lol. Anyway, Shadow Pk is not going to be some server you type ::pure and then go theive for like 5 minutes and then pk. Each player on Shadow pking will have to spend time leveling and making cash.(It’s still a lot faster then real RS). Also, A LOT!!! of servers are having problem with dupers, I know a lot of players also hate dupers. I have coded myself , my own ANTI duping. THIS IS NOT A LEECH OF SOMONE ELSE(ALL 100% BY ME).Anyway lets get started!

HOME(I know there is a lot of servers with home as edgeville but I don’t care, This is not one of them servers you see everywhere!

Quite a bit of work is down here, I coded my own bank stash, as you can see, and made a food shop. So if you get low on hp, bank, buy, eat, kick some butt!
